long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension provides a simple way to download images directly from any webpage. With a straightforward double-click on any image, the extension automatically saves the image to your default download location. No need to right-click or open additional menusâ€”just double-click to instantly download the image.

Key Features:

Easy Image Download: Double-click on any image on a webpage to download it quickly.
No Extra Clicks: Streamlined process with no context menus or additional steps.
Universal Compatibility: Works with images across all websites and web applications.
Enjoy a hassle-free experience with quick image downloads using this lightweight and efficient Chrome extension.
